meanings.definition: A small card used in photography to capture images on film.
meanings.sent1: I inserted the filmcard into the camera to take pictures.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to remove the filmcard gently to avoid damaging the images.
meanings.sent3: The filmcard went on strike and refused to capture any more photos!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was a filmcard, storing snapshots of every moment.
meanings.sent5: The filmcard acted like a tiny canvas, painting scenes with light and shadow.

meanings.definition: A card used to store film for a camera.
meanings.sent1: The filmcard held the precious film tightly inside.
meanings.sent2: Before shooting, always check if the filmcard has enough space for more film.
meanings.sent3: The filmcard decided to take a vacation and left the camera filmless!
meanings.sent4: His heart was a filmcard, preserving memories of love and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The filmcard guarded the film like a loyal protector, never letting any light spoil it.

meanings.definition: A card used to record information for a film production.
meanings.sent1: The filmcard contained essential details for the movie shoot.
meanings.sent2: Without the filmcard, the crew would be lost in a sea of production notes.
meanings.sent3: The filmcard told a joke on set, making everyone laugh during a break.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a filmcard, storing scripts and scenes for future projects.
meanings.sent5: The filmcard was like a treasure map, guiding the team through the film production process.
